General.Name: Israel Land Development Urban Renewal Ltd
General.Description: Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd engages in urban renewal activities. The company was formerly known as Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd and changed its name to Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd. in February 2019. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel. Israel Land Development - Urban Renewal Ltd is a subsidiary of The Israel land Development Company Ltd.
